source.name: q9
source.instructions: Choose the possible potential problem(s) that cause stable communication issues between two instances located in different subnets on the same vpc:

answers.answer: The security group attached to instance B does not allow outbound traffic at all
The role instance A assumes is not allowing socket connection
Network throughput exceeded the maximum limit
The Network ACL on subnet B does not allow outbound traffic
The routing table of subnet A has no target to route to subnet B
